## InputValidationError.getFieldErrors() method

Gets the validation errors for a specific field.

**Signature:**

```typescript
getFieldErrors(fieldName: string): string[];
```

## Parameters

<table><thead><tr><th>

Parameter


</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

fieldName


</td><td>

string


</td><td>

The name of the field to get errors for


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

**Returns:**

string\[\]

Array of error messages for the field, or empty array if no errors

## Example


```typescript
const emailErrors = validationError.getFieldErrors('email');
if (emailErrors.length > 0) {
  console.log('Email errors:', emailErrors);
}
```
